title: Regal Neelam Kasulaperu Haaram - A Symphony of Sapphire and Sparkle
materials: Crafted with precision in a high-quality metal alloy
studded with brilliant-cut diamonds (Dwt: 10.64) and captivating Neelam Sapphires (13.16 carats
7 stones). Meticulously set stones ensuring lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a traditional Kasulaperu design, re-imagined with modern elegance. Features a central medallion with intricate diamond detailing and cascading sapphire accents, forming a breathtaking statement piece. The repeating floral motifs, all adorned with diamonds, add to its timeless appeal.
colors: Primarily a dazzling white from the diamonds
contrasted beautifully with the deep blue of the Neelam Sapphires
creating a striking and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
and upscale social gatherings. A sophisticated choice for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and contemporary events.
description: This Neelam Kasulaperu Haaram is a testament to refined craftsmanship. The deep blue sapphires symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. Its diamond-encrusted design adds a touch of modern luxury, ensuring you'll be the center of attention. A unique blend of tradition and contemporary style makes this a truly remarkable piece.
